results.content: It started out with something good I guess, then suddenly the teacher used google translate. Which lead to the voice and the video was not in sync. Then I tried to see if that was the case with the other videos, and realized that the videos were made from like 5 years ago which did not sound like the original coordinator. This is a scam.

response.content:
Hello Dimiliano. I'm sorry you think this is a scam. Different mics were used in some videos and that must be the difference in voice tones. If you will study and follow the videos you will become a professional WordPress Web Developer.
Googled translate was not used also.
